name: Byron’s Jellyfish Jam
description:
Dance to the music while painting a beautiful picture under water! Try to get the best combo.

This is a work in progress game jam game made for PIGSquads Summer Slow Jams July 2019. It was made in a little under a weeks time!

TODO: For now the game is a single course, however soon we will update with a couple more courses.  Stay tuned!

Controls & How to Play

Follow your guide and mirror its moves while you dance to the beat!

Keyboard:

  • Space: Start game on title screen
  • Arrow Keys: Movement

Team members

  • Brian Cain: Programming
  • Bynine: Art
  • Casey Frantum: Sound and Music
